headline:
Real-time context monitoring.
Inside your editor.
tagline: Track token budgets with real tokenizers, score tab relevance, and manage context â€” a VS Code sidebar that pays for itself.

features.name: Token Budget Dashboard
features.description: Activity bar sidebar panel showing real-time token usage, budget meter, per-file breakdown, and active tokenizer info.

features.name: @tokalator Chat Participant
features.description: Eleven chat commands for inline budget management directly in Copilot Chat.

features.name: Tab Relevance Scoring
features.description: Ranks open tabs by relevance using import analysis, path similarity, edit recency, and diagnostics.

features.name: Model-Specific Tokenizers
features.description: Real BPE tokenizers per provider â€” Claude BPE for Anthropic, o200k_base for OpenAI. No more guessing at 4 chars per token.

features.name: 14 Model Profiles
features.description: Built-in profiles for Opus 4.6, Sonnet 4.5/4, Haiku 4.5, GPT-5.2, GPT-5.2 Codex, GPT-5.1, GPT-5 Mini, GPT-4.1, o3, o4-mini, Gemini 3 Pro/Flash, Gemini 2.5 Pro. Context windows and rot thresholds auto-configured.

features.name: Context Rot Warnings
features.description: Warns when conversation turns exceed the model's threshold. Each model has its own rot limit based on benchmarks.

features.name: Pinned Files
features.description: Pin important files so they are always treated as high-relevance in context scoring.

features.name: Instruction File Scanner
features.description: Finds all instruction files in your workspace (.instructions.md, .prompt.md, AGENTS.md, .cursorrules) and counts their real token cost.

features.name: Next Turn Preview
features.description: See estimated token cost of your next message before sending. Dashboard shows a live preview box with growth projections and overflow warnings.

features.name: Session Management
features.description: Track per-turn context growth with compaction analysis. Reset sessions, save summaries, and see last session stats on activation.

settings.description: AI model to calculate context budget against. Sets tokenizer, context window, and rot threshold automatically.

Override context window size in tokens. Leave at default to use the selected model's window.
